vote.title: To Recognize and Celebrate the Building Ceremony of Kingdom Life Church
vote.description:
Title
 
To Recognize and Celebrate the Building Ceremony of Kingdom Life Church
 
Body
 
WHEREAS, Kingdom Life Church is a church located in the Columbus community, whose purpose is to raise up a Christ-centered, cross-cultural, covenantal community of believers dedicated to making His praise glorious and establishing the Kingdom of God upon the earth; and 
 
WHEREAS, Kingdom Life Church will unveil their new location at 4242 Macsway Ave, Columbus Ohio, 43232. This locations prior use was a Salvation Army, that has now gone under construction and development to become a homechurch to many; and
 
WHEREAS, This new location will help promote the many ministry services they provide such as, Kingdom Life Church Ministries of Education, Kingdom Warriors Institute, R.E.A.L. M.E.N., Kingdom Women of Excellence, Kingdom Kids and Faith Led Youth Ministries, and Kingdom Young Adults Group; and
 
WHEREAS, Kingdom Life Church will cultivate their mission of, “To LOVE, LEAD, LIBERATE and LAUNCH God’s people into His divine purpose through SERVING, EVANGELIZING and DISCIPLESHIP” in this new location as well as impact others through their vision, “is to LOVE, LIVE, and CARE like Christ”; now, therefore
 
BE IT RESOLVED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS: That this Council does hereby recognize and celebrate the Building Ceremony of Kingdom Life Church and their fruitful future that is to come in this new location.
